name: Aroy Dee
description:
Vilasini is a young woman (kathoey) looking to start her own business by making Thailand's popular spicy foods.

In this clicker style game, you will help her cook up dishes until you reach maximum temperature!

This is my first ever game made for a game jam: Jame Gam under the theme of Food with the special feature of a Thermometer. Made in about four days with RPG Maker MV. It's a little sparse but I hope it brings you a little happiness in your day!

Background derived from https://blank-canvas.itch.io/parallax-pixel-art-background-desert
